title: Auto filled into sup then had to dodge
body: So i just got auto filled into sup despite the fact that i dont even own a support champion, so i dodge and get a 30 min queue ban, thx for that riot, this is why i love your game.

replies.body:
> i dont even own a support champion

checks champ progress, lvl 2 soraka, lvl 2 leona

why for you lie.
Could be on free to play.
Auto-fill should just be renamed to 'Support'.

Perhaps he means the auto fill that activates on low population times like late at night/early morning.

This cannot be disabled and is basically just a "You play support now" indicator.

Its odd that nobody else mentioned this and just assumed he picked fill when he said autofill
still if no ones queing for support... imagine the wait times without it.

This is ranked we're talking about here. I queue to play well and win.

Being forced into a role that I do not like or can not play not only ruins it for me, but the rest of my team.

Thats why having a role forced upon you is such a stupid feature. It should honestly be there as optional and leave it at that.

Im already bronze, I can't carry from a role I'm not comfortable with

And this attitude is why there is an autofill feature which basically equates to getting support. If there wasn't people would be complaining about que times.

Just nut up and play support once in a while. Its not even as bad as people make it out to be

It's funny because of all my friends I play with alot out of 9 people we have 7 support mains ranging from Platinum to Silver; and then there's me the unranked but probably bronze 5 support/fill main.

It wouldn't hurt to own and learn at least one support in case autofill ever allocates the role to you and no one wants to swap. Support is actually quite a flexible role and can actually be quite fun if you find the right champion. Sure beats dodging and not playing at all.

I don't understand how you don't own a support champion.., Also you picked autofill, you kinda have to expect you might get the support role. You disappoint me, soloq needs supports and there are only so many support mains, dodging because you had to play support every once in a while is poor form. Also soraka is like 450ip that's less than a quintessence and you don't even have to be good with soraka to do well with her since she has harass, silence and heals; mechanically braindead.

You didn't need to dodge the game, auto-fill is there so that you don't wait absurdly long times to play a game that could possibly only last 30 minutes. Sure we all hate being auto-filled but I prefer it to having to wait hoursjust to play a 20 minute game.
